snippet.title: Warshmallows - FREE DEMO on Steam!
snippet.description:
FREE DEMO NOW ON STEAM 📢
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1248150/Warshmallows/

Warshmallows was chosen by Steam to participate in the upcoming Steam Game Festival, so Warshmallows is now out for the whole world to test out and have fun with!

You can take all of your friends to the arenas and show them who's boss. No beta key required, just download the demo!

During the Game Festival there will be developer live streams on Steam! That's crazy!
We'd love to see you there. After all, Warshmallows is nothing without it's players and you've helped improve the game so much!

📅 Check livestream schedules from our Steam page!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1248150/Warshmallows/

I'm also happy to tell you that the full release of Warshmallows is coming soon!
So don't forget to hit that wishlist button to be the first one to know when it happens.

So many good news to share today. I hope you all are having a good day as well. 
Here, take this monkey for good luck. 🐒

🔥 Thank you all. I'll see you on the arenas! 🔥👀

Warshmallows on social media:
➡️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/warshmallows
➡️ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warshmallows_/
➡️ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warshmallows
